Package mysql

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBICategorizer
    interface to read data from a database
    DBICrawler
    interface for writing data into a database
    DBIGUI
    interface for modifying some data from a database (with restrictions)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessData
    class to save access data for a mysql database
    DBcategorizer
    class to address a database with read-only Access
    DBConnection
    class to connect to a MySQL database
    DBcrawler
    class to write data into a database
    DBgui
    class to modify the database restricted
    InsertDates
